title: Got leaverbuster because of a bugsplat that made me download 3gb of content
body:
So i was entering a ranked game and mid loading i get a blugsplat and i was like oh i guess i'll just reconnect
But then when i get in I was forced to download 3gb of content to "repair" my client and guess what now i'm with 5 more 20 mins of waiting because riot can't even repair their broken leaverbuster bot so that it can distinguish people who left the game from people who got crashed and were forced to re download 3gb or less of content.
Please riot get your shit together.

replies.body: This has been happening to me for several times and having used hextech repair tool to re-patch and re-install and after I tried using a driver booster to help me, today it happened **_again_** :')

Hmmm it sounds like some damaged or corrupted files were detected, so your client was attempting to repair itself so that those crashes wouldn't happen anymore. If that repair keeps happening, I'd suggest grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running a quick **force repatch** to install the latest patch again.
Yet i do think riot should improve their leaverbuster so that it would be able to see between someone who got his game crashed or someone who left on purpose

Great once again it happened 1 game after doing all leaver busters
good job riot
